text: Unterbözberg was a municipality of the district of Brugg in the canton of Aargau in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013, the former municipalities of Unterbözberg, Gallenkirch, Linn and Oberbözberg merged into the new municipality of Bözberg. ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Aargau Category:2013 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Unterbözberg
